article:
'Ufology' is the array of subject matter and activities associated with an
interest in unidentified flying objects (UFOs). UFOs have been subject to
various investigations over the years by governments, independent groups, and
scientists. The term derives from [[UFO]], which is pronounced as an acronym,
and the suffix [[-logy]], which comes from the Ancient Greek Î»Î¿Î³Î¯Î± (logiÄ).
headings: Notable studies, panels, and conferences in ufology
